item.description:
If you missed Oshkosh, might not want to miss this!
Short half hour flight to Portsmouth.
Class D airspace. We'll need to leave FIT early though, 7:00 am depart times should be great!

" Can I fly my aircraft to the show?
All aircraft must be in the chocks by 8:55am on Saturday and Sunday of the event and not expect to leave until after the show concludes around 4:30pm each day. Fly-In aircraft should expect to go to General Aviation Parking near Port City Air."

Vintage or classic aircraft flying into the event on Saturday or Sunday AM that would like to static display, should contact David Schultz Airshows via email at airboss@schultzairshows.com.
http://www.navmonster...

Hold on to your hat! The most famous jet team in the world will rock the skies with a rare New England appearance. The Blue Angels..

Planes will fly in formation, backward, tail first and straight down when the Boston-Portsmouth Air Show hits the skies


As well as our friend Mike Goulian, Sean Tucker, Rob Holland, F-16, F-18, B-25, and lots of static displays.

http://newenglandairs...

Questions: Phone 603-625-6431 or Contact us electronically Internet and Advance Purchase
(Available through 8/27) On-Site Gate Purchase (Available 8/28 & 8/29)
Adult $20.00 Adult $25.00

This is an all day event. We need to be down and chocked by 8:30 a.m. No leaving until air show is over, after 5:00.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: The Boston Portsmouth Air Show.
